AzureAd.Domain: use appsettings.Development.json [Enter the domain of your tenant, e.g. contoso.onmicrosoft.com]
AzureAd.TenantId: use appsettings.Development.json [Enter 'common', or 'organizations' or the Tenant Id (Obtained from the Azure portal. Select 'Endpoints' from the 'App registrations' blade and use the GUID in any of the URLs), e.g. da41245a5-11b3-996c-00a8-4d99re19f292]
AzureAd.ClientId: use appsettings.Development.json [Enter the Client Id (Application ID obtained from the Azure portal), e.g. ba74781c2-53c2-442a-97c2-3d60re42f403]
AzureAd.ClientSecret: use appsettings.Development.json [Copy the client secret added to the app from the Azure portal]
